Detailed Description

TeleoReactor related exception.

An exception produced while manipulating a reactor.

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ReactorException::ReactorException ( TeleoReactor const &  r,
std::string const &  msg 
) throw ()

Constructor.

Parameters:
[in] r The source of the exception
[in] msg The associated message

Create a new instance with an ossociated message that indicates that this exception is due to the TeleoReactor r and that the error can be described as msg.
